flawed_nl_solution:
If Calvin had scored 500 points and Paislee 3/4 times as many points as Calvin, Paislee had scored 3/4*500=735 points.
To have a chance of tying the game, Paislee had to score 500-735=<<500-735=-235>>-235 points

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 375, not 735. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
